text: Randenburg is a village in the Dutch province of South Holland. It is a part of the former municipality of Reeuwijk, and lies about 6 km northwest of Gouda. The statistical area "Randenburg", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 180.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. ==References== Category:Bodegraven-Reeuwijk Category:Populated places in South Holland
title: Randenburg
